meanings.sent1: Her honesty was unimpeachable, everyone trusted her completely.
meanings.sent2: The evidence against him was unimpeachable, there was no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: Even the mischievous cat found her unimpeachable sincerity endearing.
meanings.sent4: The unimpeachable beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: His unimpeachable integrity shone brightly in a world full of deceit.

meanings.definition: Not able to be doubted or questioned
meanings.sent1: The witness's testimony was unimpeachable, it left no room for skepticism.
meanings.sent2: The unimpeachable logic of his argument convinced even the skeptics.
meanings.sent3: The unimpeachable alibi provided by the suspect surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her unimpeachable memory was like a steel trap, never faltering.
meanings.sent5: The unimpeachable evidence presented in court sealed the case.
